entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
